name: Adidas Runners Plyometrics + Easy Run
about:
Enhance your running performance and recovery with our Plyometrics + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted mobility exercises with a relaxed run to help you move better and feel stronger.

This session is suitable for runners of all levels looking to improve mobility, recover effectively, and enjoy a stress-free run.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.

name: Adidas Runners Back To Basics - Beginner Special
about: Take your first step into the world of running with our Beginner Special: Back to Basics session! This event is designed to help new runners build confidence, understand running fundamentals, and kickstart their journey in a supportive community.
